#summary Notes on Brat syntax
#labels Phase-Design,syntax

_Semicolons are optional line enders and no one will cry if you don't use them._

*Print something (adds newline)*

`p "hello world"`

*Creating a new object*

`x = new`

`x = y.new`  (This is like subclassing)

`x = y.clone` (This is like prototyping or something)

*Setting 'fields'*

`person = new`

`person.name = "Bob"`

*Defining functions*

`x = { p "hello again, world" }`

`x = {|name| p "oh, hi ", name }`

`add = {|x, y| x + y }`

*Calling a function*
_Parentheses optional_

`add 1, 2`
`add(1,2)`

*Getting a function*

`test = new`

`test.method = {|x| p "You gave me: ", x }`

`x = new`

`x.method = test->method`
